Judul: OVERBURDEN DUMP STABILITY IN COAL OPEN PIT MINE WITH WEAK COAL-BEARING STRATA
Abstrak:
Stability of overburden dump in coal open pit mine needs to be maintained during the mining operation.
Overburden dump failure will lead to severe loss, such as damage to eguipment and facilities or even casualty. It
will also cause a long term effect on production, such as shortage space for dumping operation, longer hauling E
distance or even coal reserve loss. The challenge of maintaining overburden dump stability is even more difficult
JSor coal mines with a relatively young age of coal-bearing strata and high intensity of rainfall, such as coal mines
in Indonesia. This paper highlights the challenges that occur for overburden dumping operation in Indonesian 1
coal mines. Case studies from several coal mines in Indonesia are taken. The causes of failure, analysis, and
countermeasures will be highlighted to give a comprehensive understanding of overburden dump stability in coal
open pit mine with weak coal-bearing strata.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Budi Sulistianto and Ginting Jalu Kusuma
